DOC.brief_summary: With many medication prescribe relative time day meal . This study establish pre dinner v post dinner exercise effective alter post dinner glucose triglyceride level vs exercise .
DOC.brief_title: Pre-dinner vs. Post-dinner Exercise Glycemic Control
DOC.detailed_description: All participant complete three trial random order consume standardized dinner meal 1 ) RE ( NoRE ) , 2 ) pre-dinner RE ( RE→M ) , 3 ) post-dinner RE begin 45 min dinner ( M→RE ) . Diet standardized day test . Participants report lab testing sometime 3 - 5:30 p.m. upon arrival venous catheter insert forearm vein . Frequent blood sampling , indirect calorimetry measurement , subjective well-being measurement ensue ~5.75 h participant lab .
DOC.criteria: Obese ( body mass index 3045 kg/m2 ) Physician diagnose type 2 diabetes receive standard medical care Nonsmokers Pregnancy Lactating mother Insulin Surgical weight loss Orthopedic limitation exercise Weight loss previous 3 month
